techmeme.title: A look at Congress' absurd plan to ban DJI drones in the US, even as the company adds restrictions and features to comply with US government regulations (Jason Koebler/404 Media)
Indian grocery delivery startup Zepto raised $665M Series F co-led by Glade Brook, Nexus, and StepStone Group at a $3.6B valuation, up from $1.4B in August 2023 (Manish Singh/TechCrunch)
Australia's eSafety Commissioner waters down child abuse and terror content detection rules on E2E encrypted services, after a push back from tech companies (Josh Taylor/The Guardian)
In a filing, ByteDance urged a US court to strike down a law that could ban TikTok in the US, recounting lengthy talks that it says the US ended in August 2022 (David Shepardson/Reuters)
iOS 18 brings a new API called AccessorySetupKit, letting third-party accessory makers build the same quick pairing experience as Apple accessories like AirPods (Filipe Espósito/9to5Mac)
